# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.


add_executable(ydb-tests-fq-control_plane_storage)

target_compile_options(ydb-tests-fq-control_plane_storage PRIVATE
  -DUSE_CURRENT_UDF_ABI_VERSION
)

target_include_directories(ydb-tests-fq-control_plane_storage PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/fq/libs/control_plane_storage
)

target_link_libraries(ydb-tests-fq-control_plane_storage PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  cpp-testing-unittest_main
  fq-libs-control_plane_storage
  library-cpp-retry
  cpp-testing-unittest
  ydb-core-external_sources
  libs-actors-logging
  fq-libs-init
  libs-quota_manager-events
  libs-rate_limiter-control_plane_service
  libs-rate_limiter-events
  core-testlib-default
  ydb-library-security
)

target_link_options(ydb-tests-fq-control_plane_storage PRIVATE
  -ldl
  -lrt
  -Wl,--no-as-needed
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -lpthread
  -lrt
  -ldl
  -lutil
)

target_sources(ydb-tests-fq-control_plane_storage PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/tests/fq/control_plane_storage/in_memory_control_plane_storage_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/tests/fq/control_plane_storage/ydb_control_plane_storage_bindings_permissions_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/tests/fq/control_plane_storage/ydb_control_plane_storage_bindings_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/tests/fq/control_plane_storage/ydb_control_plane_storage_connections_permissions_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/tests/fq/control_plane_storage/ydb_control_plane_storage_connections_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/tests/fq/control_plane_storage/ydb_control_plane_storage_internal_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/tests/fq/control_plane_storage/ydb_control_plane_storage_queries_permissions_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/tests/fq/control_plane_storage/ydb_control_plane_storage_queries_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/tests/fq/control_plane_storage/ydb_control_plane_storage_quotas_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/tests/fq/control_plane_storage/ydb_control_plane_storage_ut.cpp
)

set_property(
  TARGET
  ydb-tests-fq-control_plane_storage
  PROPERTY
  SPLIT_FACTOR
  18
)

add_yunittest(
  NAME
  ydb-tests-fq-control_plane_storage
  TEST_TARGET
  ydb-tests-fq-control_plane_storage
  TEST_ARG
  --print-before-suite
  --print-before-test
  --fork-tests
  --print-times
  --show-fails
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-tests-fq-control_plane_storage
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  MEDIUM
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-tests-fq-control_plane_storage
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-tests-fq-control_plane_storage
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
  YDB_DRIVER_BINARY=ydb/apps/ydbd/ydbd
)

target_allocator(ydb-tests-fq-control_plane_storage
  cpp-malloc-jemalloc
)

vcs_info(ydb-tests-fq-control_plane_storage)
